message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose all the details right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm willing to let it go for a price that's more than fair, but I'm also confident it's an investment that will pay off handsomely for you.  Would you be interested in discussing a price of $1500000?
